title: ML Engineer
content: I've worked building computer vision, NLP, and object tracking models. As well as maintaining and monitoring models into production environments, and implementing ML Ops in the machine learning life-cycle.

title: Software Developer
content: I have experience developing web based applications, working with different languages and deploying them into production environments while taking advantage of my QA knowledge to deliver quality products.

title: QA Engineer
content:
I have experience building QA strategies (through different levels) based on business needs and product value.
Passionate about learning new things and taking the QA part of my heart.
